Description: The best of urban design has arrived in Odenton, Maryland. Welcome to Flats170 at Academy Yard, where you?ll be greeted with richly appointed interiors, first-class amenities, and eco-friendly touches that will make you feel right at home. Our central location in Anne Arundel County means you are never far from work or play. We are next door to Fort Meade and the NSA, close to numerous defense and tech companies, and within 30 minutes of Annapolis, Baltimore, and Washington, DC. The MARC train station is less than one mile down the road, and BWI is just 10 minutes away.

Description: The lifestyle you've always imagined awaits you at Fieldstone Farm. These spectacular apartment homes in the Piney Orchard community offer luxury and resort-style living while compromising nothing. Here, you'll have the opportunity to avail yourself of a variety of amenities including a 45-acre wildlife preserve, a beautiful lake, extensive walking and biking paths, tennis courts, and even an ice rink. The Piney Orchard Community Center features a year-round indoor lap pool and whirlpool, 3 outdoor pools, and a multi-stationed playground. There's something for everyone...and then there's so much more. It's all waiting for you when you live at Fieldstone Farm.

Description: At The Village at Odenton Station, our luxury apartments for rent in Odenton have expansive rooms, spacious closets and a hardwood dining area, you will feel right at home from the minute you move in to your new Odenton apartment. Enjoy our on-site fitness center or take on the outdoors with the hiker/biker trail. Create magical meals at home or grab food just seconds from your luxury apartment in Odenton, MD. Spend your weekends curled up on your couch or out shopping with friends - all on the premises of The Village at Odenton Station. The Odenton MARC Train Station is located across the street with easy access to D.C. and Baltimore. Also, you will find our luxury apartments near Arundel Mills Mall, the BWI airport, Fort Meade and NSA. * Village Retail NOW OPEN: Ruths Chris, Kiddie Academy, Baltimore Coffee & Tea, Bliss Nail & Spa, Physiotherapy Associates, Odenton Station Dental, A Better You and Odenton Statio Cleaners. Coming soon CJays Barbershop.

Description: Shelter Cove Apartments is a true value. Our community offers classic and newly renovated apartment home, abundant amenities and the absolute best location! Bike or walk on our tree-lined sidewalks, lay a blanket under our canopy of trees and read a book or have a picnic, bask in the sun at our pool and sundeck, or just enjoy abundant space in our one, two or three-bedroom apartment homes with optional dens. Don’t let our small town setting fool you; shopping and dining are just minutes away. We are also minutes from major freeways, Fort Meade, BWI Airport and the MARC train and just a short drive to downtown DC, Baltimore and Annapolis. Come home to Shelter Cove.

Description: Come home to a new perspective on luxury living in Odenton, MD-Seven Oaks Apartments. Our luxury apartments provide a wealth of convenience through our many exclusive amenities. Our unique style is enhanced by our great location, making Seven Oaks the best apartments in the Fort Meade area. Enjoy relaxing in your one or two bedroom home, carefully designed with you in mind. Each of our apartments in Odenton come with walk-in closets, an expansive balcony, and gas burning fireplace that offers you the perfect way to enjoy a cozy evening at home. For your added convenience, our Odenton, MD apartments also provide an in-unit washer and dryer. Residents of our Severn, MD apartment community can work out in our fitness center, invite friends over for a social function in our clubhouse, or spend an afternoon in our invigorating pool or sauna. Close to Ft Meade, MARC Train Station, Baltimore, Washington D.C, BWI, Fort Meade - RT 295, 175, 32, 97, 170, makes this a centrally located p...lace to call home. Hurry this is a great price in a wonderful community! Available late Sept/early Oct.

Where the design and features are thoughtfully considered, the amenities are much more than an afterthought, and the service would not be out of place in a fine hotel. At Novus Odenton, our goal is to offer you an unparalleled living experience from curb to closet.

A must see home! SEE PHOTOS!

One car garage.

MASTER bedroom W/super BA & walkin clst. W/O LL W/in-law. 2 car garage with nearby free parking. Community with park/tennis CTs/plygrnds/walk trails. Ready to move in.

Off street parking and Bonus 1 car garage. Community offers Swimming pools tot lots walking/jogging paths tennis courts ice rink community center local shopping and much more! Minutes to Fort Meade/NSA/MARC train station.

Description: Lovely end of group townhome with 3 bedrooms including 2 master bedrooms and one car garage. Freshly painted interior and brand new carpeting throughout. 2 Story ceiling in living room with gas fireplace. Balconies. All appliances including washer & dryer and gas range. Community center pool & more. Great location to NSA Ft Meade Baltimore & Washington DC. Must see!

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Eat-in Kitchen
* Microwave
* Oven
* Refrigerator

The kitchen has lots of cabinet space and there s a separate breakfast nook as well. Laundry room with full size washer and dryer patio and more!

* Washer/Dryer
* Air Conditioning
* Ceiling Fans
* Fireplace

Description:
(410) 902-1100 - Spacious Garage Townhome in Piney Orchard - Best location in sought after Piney Orchard! Surrounded by the nature preserve, this home offers plenty of privacy AND there is no carpet in the house! Spacious open concept main level w/ eat in kitchen offering granite counters, TONS of cabinet space & beautiful green views. The master suite has a large walk-in closet and luxury bath. Amazing community amenities, pools, gym, playgrounds, trails and shopping! Close to Ft. Meade, MARC and commuter routes.
(RLNE3577429) Other Amenities - Other- open floorplan, no carpet, eat-in kitchen, granite counters, cabinet space, master suite, walk-in closet, luxury bath, piney orchard amenities.

Description:
(703) 825-0957 - Gorgeous 3BR/2BA Condo in Gambrills, MD - Close to Ft. Meade! - Gorgeous 3 bedroom and 2 bathroom two story condo in highly desirable Gambrills neighborhood close to Ft. Meade! Features include a spacious living room/dining room combo, gas fireplace and lots of natural light. Galley style kitchen offers breakfast bar, custom tiled flooring, newer appliances, pantry and ample cabinet storage space. The second level has an updated full hall bath with tiled tub enclosure and vanity and 3 bedrooms, including access to a private balcony great for entertaining and enjoying the outdoors. A large master bedroom with walk-in closet and built-in storage unit leads to a full bath with walk-in shower, tiled tub enclosure and modern vanity with updated fixtures. Tenant has access to one car garage and large driveway for ample parking space. Easy access to major commuter routes and several shopping/restaurant options at the Waugh Chapel Towne Center!
Pets considered on a case by case basis with additional pet deposit.
Contact JC at (703) 825-0957 for details or to schedule an appointment or email jsolorzano@baymgmtgroup.com
You can apply for this unit or get more information at our website http://www.baymgmtgroup.com/laurel-md-rental-listings/laurel-single-family/

Description:
(703) 825-0957 - Spacious 3BR/2BA Single Family Home in Odenton, MD! - Spacious 3 bedroom and 2 bath single family home in Odenton, MD close to Ft. Meade and many major commuter routes! This split foyer style home is nestled in a quiet family-friendly neighborhood close to GORC park and several walking trails. Features include spacious eat-in kitchen with granite countertops, ample cabinet storage space and updated appliances. A cozy living room area is great for entertaining and leads to three spacious bedrooms and a full bathroom with tiled tub/shower enclosure. Fully finished basement club room has a second full bath with custom tiled shower and a separate room that would make a great office or hobby room. Enjoy a fully-fenced private backyard and garage/driveway area that allows for plenty of parking and additional storage options. This beautiful home is within the Four Seasons school district and only minutes from the Waugh Chapel Shopping Center which offers lots of entertainment, shopping and dining options! 
Sorry, no pets.
Contact JC at (703) 825-0957 for details or to schedule an appointment or email jsolorzano@baymgmtgroup.com
You can apply for this unit or get more information at our website http://www.baymgmtgroup.com/laurel-md-rental-listings/laurel-single-family/

(703) 825-0957 - Beautiful Updated 3BR/2.5BA End of Row TH in Odenton, MD - Beautiful Updated 3 Bedroom 2 Full 1/2 Bathroom End of Row Townhouse in Odenton, MD. Features first floor with gorgeous hardwood flooring throughout a spacious living room/dining room combo.The area has a working wood fireplace, With ½ bath and a fully updated kitchen with granite countertops, new cabinets and all stainless appliances including dishwasher and gas stove. The second floor has 3 spacious bedrooms including master bedroom with walk in closet, and a fully updated hall bath with tiled floors, his/her vanity and updated fixtures. A Fully finished basement club room with tiled floors, full bath with walk in shower and laundry/storage area with washer/dryer included. Includes a Spacious deck, patio and backyard that backs up to a wooded area for entertaining. Tenants have access to 3 community pools, fitness center and tennis courts!
Contact JC Solorzano at (703) 825-0957 for details or to schedule an appointment or email jsolorzano@baymgmtgroup.com

(RLNE2414357) Other Amenities - Other- private location, open living room, cathedral ceilings, updated kitchen, granite counters, stainless steel appliances, breakfast bar, owners' suite w/ walk-in closet, private master bath, spacious 2nd bedroom, piney orchard amenities.

Description:
---- SCHEDULE A SHOWING ONLINE AT: http://showmojo.com/lac/68eec92012 ----
Spacious 2 bedroom, 2 bath condo with an open plan living and dining area, in the Piney Orchard community of Odenton. Hardwood laminate floors and upgraded carpet.  Private balcony that backs to open area and tennis courts.  Short distance to neighborhood restaurants and stores, easy commute to DC or Baltimore via the nearby Marc train. Community facilities include: Swimming pools, tennis courts, exercise room, biking and walking trails, playgrounds and community center

Description:
Charming 3-lvl garage townhome near Ft Meade. Newly renovated with new laminate flooring in living room, dining room and hall and ceramic tile in foyer, kitchen, and bathrooms. Upgraded stainless steel appliances in the kitchen. Spa bath in master bedroom. This 3 bedrooms 2 full and 2 half baths townhouse is a must see!
This property allows self guided viewing without an appointment. Contact for details.

Description: This 2 bedrooms 2 baths unit brings you the best of condo living and the friendly neighborhood of Piney Orchard in Odenton MD. The bedrooms and closets are large and spacious, the living and dining room has plenty of space for any size furniture. The kitchen has lots of cabinet space, and there's a separate, breakfast nook as well. Laundry room with full size washer and dryer, it also has a great Patio area to relax. Small pets are welcomed.

Description:
ACCEPTING APPLICATIONS FOR THE WAIT LIST!
Apply today to live in Odenton’s newest affordable apartment community. These beautiful two bedroom, one bath apartments feature modern upgrades tucked away in a residential setting.
Located in the Odenton Town Center, the LEED Silver certified building will house an array of amenity spaces including a community room, internet cafe, fitness center, and bicycle storage area.
Minimum income levels and income restrictions apply. Rental assistance welcome.
